12.1.18  4:01 pm   hi bill, i play the keys, and i'll eventually play with a band or other people, but i'm not sure how this accompaniment thing works. what i do right now is listen my favorite records and accompany them while listening. i play chord after chord after chord and that doesn't work for every song, sure it's fine for some but it doesn't sound good for some. you know a lot about music and i guess you've gone through this sometime. how do i make my accompaniments more exciting, like get some interesting melodic or rythmic stuff going instead of playing chords on the right and octave root notes at the left.
